newsArray.title: 26 की उम्र में क्रिकेटर ने संन्यास का किया ऐलान, भारत के खिलाफ किया था डेब्यू
creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: ऑस्ट्रेलिया के उदीयमान क्रिकेटर विल पुकोवस्की ने संन्यास की घोषणा की है. पुकोवस्की ने भारत के खिलाफ टेस्ट क्रिकेट में डेब्यू किया था. वह उनका पहला और आखिरी टेस्ट मैच रहा. 26 साल के पुकोव्सकी पिछले कुछ समय से लगातार सिर में चोट और कनकशन से परेशान थे.

newsArray.title: Caribbean Premier League 2024: Live Streaming, Squads, Schedule - All You Need To Know
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Streaming: The 12th edition of the Caribbean Premier League (CPL) 2024 is set to kick off on Friday, August 30. The opening match will feature the Antigua and Barbuda Falcons facing off against the St Kitts and Nevis Patriots at the iconic Sir Vivian Richards Stadium.In the playoff stage, the top two teams on CPL 2024 points table will compete in Qualifier 1. The winner of this match will secure a direct spot in the final, while the losing team will have a second chance to reach the final.The third and fourth-ranked teams will face off in Eliminator, with the winner advancing to play the loser of Qualifier 1. The victor of this match will then qualify for the final on October 6 in Guyana.When and Where to watch Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Streaming, TelecastWhen will Caribbean Premier League 2024 season start?Caribbean Premier League 2024 season on Friday (August 30).When and Where to watch Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Streaming in India?Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Streaming in India will be available on FanCode.When and Where to watch Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Telecast in India?Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Telecast in India will be available on Star Sports.CPL squadsTrinbago Knight Riders: Kieron Pollard, Andre Russell, Sunil Narine, Nicholas Pooran, Tim David, Akeal Hosein, Jason Roy, Dwayne Bravo, Josh Little, Waqar Salamkheil, Jayden Seales, Ali Khan, Mark Deyal, Keacy Carty, Terrence Hinds, Nathan Edward, Shaquere ParrisAntigua & Barbuda Falcons: Imad Wasim, Brandon King, Fabian Allen, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Amir, Chris Green, Fakhar Zaman, Roshon Primus, Justin Greaves, Hayden Walsh, Jahmar Hamilton, Teddy Bishop, Kofi James, Shamar Springer, Kelvin Pitman, Jewel Andrew, Joshua JamesSt Kitts & Nevis Patriots: Kyle Mayers, Wanindu Hasaranga, Rilee Rossouw, Evin Lewis, Sherfane Rutherford, Sikandar Raza, Nuwan Thushara, Andre Fletcher, Tristan Stubbs, Dominic Drakes, Mikyle Louis, Odean Smith, Joshua da Silva, Veerasammy Permaul, Ryan John, Ashmead Nedd, Johann LayneSaint Lucia Kings: Heinrich Klaasen, Faf du Plessis, Alzarri Joseph, Johnson Charles, Roston Chase, Noor Ahmad, David Wiese, Bhanuka Rajapaksa, Matthew Forde, Aaron Jones, Khary Pierre, Khari Campbell, Johann Jeremiah, Shadrack Descarte, Mikkel Govia, McKenny Clarke, Akeem AugusteBarbados Royals: Rovman Powell, Jason Holder, David Miller, Quinton de The winner of this match will secure a direct spot in the final, while the losing team will have a second chance to reach the final.The third and fourth-ranked teams will face off in Eliminator, with the winner advancing to play the loser of Qualifier 1. season start?Caribbean Premier League 2024 season on Friday (August 30).When and Where to watch Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Streaming in India?Caribbean Premier League 2024 Live Streaming in
